DataElement.preferredName: Superior Mesenteric Vein Portal Vein Occlusion Present Yes No Not Evaluable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/not evaluable indicator related to the presence of an occlusion of the superior mesenteric vein-portal vein.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Superior Mesenteric Vein Portal Vein Occlusion Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A vein that follows the path of the superior mesenteric artery and joins with the splenic vein to form the hepatic portal vein._Obstruction or a closure of hollow organ, passageway or vessel; also the transient approximation of the edges of a natural opening; imperforation._A short thick trunk vein that transports blood containing the absorbed products of digestion from the intestine directly to the liver._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Superior Mesenteric Vein Portal Vein Occlusion
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A vein that follows the path of the superior mesenteric artery and joins with the splenic vein to form the hepatic portal vein.:A short thick trunk vein that transports blood containing the absorbed products of digestion from the intestine directly to the liver.:Obstruction or a closure of hollow organ, passageway or vessel; also the transient approximation of the edges of a natural opening; imperforation.

Concepts.definition: A vein that follows the path of the superior mesenteric artery and joins with the splenic vein to form the hepatic portal vein.
A short thick trunk vein that transports blood containing the absorbed products of digestion from the intestine directly to the liver.
Obstruction or a closure of hollow organ, passageway or vessel; also the transient approximation of the edges of a natural opening; imperforation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Short segment occlusion of th
ReferenceDocuments.description: Short segment occlusion of the SMV-PV is present with normal vein above and below the level of obstruction that is amenable to resection and venous reconstruction
